name: one-eyed Pete vs The Kraken
description:
Objective

Kill The Kraken

Controls

  • Run - left or right arrow keys
  • Jump - space
  • Throw cannonball down - space two times whilst holding cannonball
  • Restart - Press R

CREDITS

Design & Development 

Game Favorites

Artwork

  • Game Favorites
  • 0x72 from itch.io https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-pirates-tileset

Text Font from dafont.com (free to use commercially)

  • N3tRunn3r

Music from pixabay.com (free to use with their license)

  • lemon music studio
  • Music town

Sound effects from freesound.org (CC0 license)

  • Cheetahzbrain - quake
  • Game Favorites - cannonball hit head and voice
  • MATRIXXX_ - coin pickup and drowning
  • Petenice - splash
  • Yottasounds - cannonball collisions
  • Zepurple - land on sand

Warnings

  • Game contains cartoon violence
  • There is some moderate screen shake

Recommendations

  • Click on the bottom right corner to play in FULL SCREEN
  • If the game is unresponsive, CLICK INSIDE THE GAME WINDOW

Development Details

This game was made using Construct 3 and it was made for GDKO 2023 - Round 3. The task is to create a boss fight.
